ui.panel.config.introduction: Ovdje možete konfigurirati vaše komponente i 牧养犬. Nije moguće baš sve konfigurirati koristeći UI zasada, ali radimo na tome.
ui.panel.config.common.editor.confirm_un: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
ui.panel.config.area_registry.caption: Registar područja
ui.panel.config.area_registry.descriptio: Pregled svih područja u vašem domu.
ui.panel.config.area_registry.picker.int: Područja se koriste za organiziranje gdje su uređaji. Ove informacije će se koristiti u cijelom 牧养犬 da vam pomogne u organizaciji sučelja, dopuštenja i integracija s drugim sustavima.
Da biste postavili uređaje u neko područje, pomoću donje veze idite na stranicu s integracijama, a zatim kliknite na konfiguriranu integraciju da biste došli do kartica uređaja.
ui.panel.config.core.caption: Općenito
ui.panel.config.core.section.core.introd: Promjena konfiguracije može biti naporan proces. Znamo. Ovaj će vam odjeljak pokušati olakšati život.
ui.panel.config.core.section.core.core_c: Uređivač je onemogućen jer je konfiguracija spremljena u configuration.yaml.
ui.panel.config.core.section.server_cont: Provjerite svoju konfiguraciju ako ste nedavno napravili neke promjene u konfiguraciji i želite biti sigurni da je sve ispravno
Neki dijelovi programa 牧养犬 mogu se ponovno učitati bez potrebe za ponovnim pokretanjem. Pritiskom na ponovno učitavanje učitava se nova konfiguracija.
Kontrolirajte vaš 牧养犬 server ... iz 牧养犬.
ui.panel.config.server_control.caption: Upravljanje poslužiteljem
ui.panel.config.server_control.descripti: Ponovo pokrenite i zaustavite 牧养犬 poslužitelj
ui.panel.config.server_control.section.v: Provjerite svoju konfiguraciju ako ste nedavno napravili neke promjene u konfiguraciji i želite biti sigurni da je sve ispravno
ui.panel.config.server_control.section.r: Neki dijelovi programa 牧养犬 mogu se ponovno učitati bez potrebe za ponovnim pokretanjem. Pritiskom na ponovno učitavanje učitava se nova konfiguracija.
ui.panel.config.server_control.section.s: Kontrolirajte vaš 牧养犬 server ... iz 牧养犬.
Jeste li sigurni da želite ponovo pokrenuti 牧养犬?
Jeste li sigurni da želite zaustaviti Home Assostant?
ui.panel.config.customize.caption: Prilagodba
ui.panel.config.customize.picker.introdu: Podešavanje atributa po entitetu. Dodane/uređene prilagodbe će odmah stupiti na snagu. Uklonjene prilagodbe stupit će na snagu kada se entitet ažurira.
ui.panel.config.automation.caption: Automatizacija
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.introd: Automatizacijski urednik omogućuje stvaranje i uređivanje automatizacije. Molimo pročitajte [upute] (https://home-assistant.io/docs/automation/editor/) kako biste bili sigurni da ste ispravno konfigurirali 牧养犬.
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.no_aut: Nismo mogli pronaći nikakve automatizirane uređaje
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.introd: Upotrijebite automatizaciju kako bi vaš dom oživio
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.load_e: Samo automatizacije u automations.yaml se mogu uređivati.
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.unsave: Imate nespremljene izmjene. Jeste li sigurni da želite napustiti?
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.trigge:
Okidači su ono što pokreće obradu pravila o automatizaciji. Moguće je odrediti više okidača za isto pravilo. Kada pokrenete okidač, 牧养犬 provjerit će uvjete, ako ih ima i pozvati akciju. 

 [Saznajte više o pokretačima.] (Https://home-assistant.io/docs/automation/trigger/)
Jeste li sigurni dai želite izbrisati?
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.condit:
Uvjeti su neobvezni dio pravila o automatizaciji i mogu se upotrebljavati kako bi se spriječilo da se neka akcija dogodi prilikom pokretanja. Uvjeti izgledaju vrlo slični pokretačima, ali su vrlo različiti. Okidač će pogledati događaje koji se događaju u sustavu, a stanje samo gleda kako sustav izgleda upravo sada. Okidač može primijetiti da je prekidač uključen. Stanje može vidjeti samo ako je uključen ili isključen prekidač. 

 [Saznajte više o uvjetima.] (Https://home-assistant.io/docs/scripts/conditions/)
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.action:
Radnje su ono što će 牧养犬 učiniti kada se aktivira automatizacija. 

 [Saznajte više o radnjama.] (Https://home-assistant.io/docs/automation/action/)
ui.panel.config.script.caption: Skripta
ui.panel.config.script.picker.introducti: The script editor allows you to create and edit scripts. Please follow the link below to read the instructions to make sure that you have configured 牧养犬 correctly.
ui.panel.config.script.picker.no_scripts: We couldn’t find any editable scripts
ui.panel.config.script.editor.load_error: Only scripts inside scripts.yaml are editable.
ui.panel.config.script.editor.delete_con: Are you sure you want to delete this script?
ui.panel.config.cloud.caption: 牧养犬 Cloud
ui.panel.config.cloud.description_featur: Upravljajte kad ste izvan kuće, integrirajte se s Alexa i Google Assistantom.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.title: Cloud Login
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.introduction: 牧养犬 Cloud provides you with a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home. It also allows you to connect with cloud-only services: Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.
This service is run by our partner
, a company founded by the founders of 牧养犬 and Hass.io.
牧养犬 Cloud is a subscription service with a free one month trial. No payment information necessary.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.learn_more_l: Learn more about 牧养犬 Cloud
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.alert_passwo: You need to change your password before logging in.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.alert_email_: You need to confirm your email before logging in.
ui.panel.config.cloud.forgot_password.in: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
ui.panel.config.cloud.forgot_password.ch: Check your email for instructions on how to reset your password.
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.title: Register Account
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.headline: Start your free trial
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.informati: Create an account to start your free one month trial with 牧养犬 Cloud. No payment information necessary.
The trial will give you access to all the benefits of 牧养犬 Cloud, including:
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.feature_r: Control of 牧养犬 away from home
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.feature_w: Easy integration with webhook-based apps like OwnTracks
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.informati: This service is run by our partner
, a company founded by the founders of 牧养犬 and Hass.io.
By registering an account you agree to the following terms and conditions.
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.account_c: Account created! Check your email for instructions on how to activate your account.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.thank_you_: Thank you for being part of 牧养犬 Cloud. It's because of people like you that we are able to make a great home automation experience for everyone. Thank you!
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.integratio: Integrations for 牧养犬 Cloud allow you to connect with services in the cloud without having to expose your 牧养犬 instance publicly on the internet.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.acc: Remote access is being prepared. We will notify you when it's ready.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.inf: 牧养犬 Cloud provides a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.ins: Your instance will be available at
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.info: With the Alexa integration for 牧养犬 Cloud you'll be able to control all your 牧养犬 devices via any Alexa-enabled device.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.enab: Enable the 牧养犬 skill for Alexa
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.info: If you enable state reporting, 牧养犬 will send all state changes of exposed entities to Amazon. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Alexa app and use the state changes to create routines.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.inf: With the Google Assistant integration for 牧养犬 Cloud you'll be able to control all your 牧养犬 devices via any Google Assistant-enabled device.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.ena: Activate the 牧养犬 skill for Google Assistant
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.inf: If you enable state reporting, 牧养犬 will send all state changes of exposed entities to Google. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Google app.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.ent: Please enter a pin to interact with security devices. Security devices are doors, garage doors and locks. You will be asked to say/enter this pin when interacting with such devices via Google Assistant.
Enter a PIN to use security devices
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.i: Anything that is configured to be triggered by a webhook can be given a publicly accessible URL to allow you to send data back to 牧养犬 from anywhere, without exposing your instance to the internet.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.n: Looks like you have no webhooks yet. Get started by configuring a
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.l: Learn more about creating webhook-powered automations.
ui.panel.config.cloud.alexa.title: Alexa
ui.panel.config.cloud.alexa.banner: Editing which entities are exposed via this UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.
ui.panel.config.cloud.google.title: Google Assistant
ui.panel.config.cloud.google.banner: Editing which entities are exposed via this UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.

ui.panel.config.devices.caption: uređaji
ui.panel.config.entity_registry.caption: Registar entiteta
ui.panel.config.entity_registry.picker.i: 牧养犬 drži registar svakog entiteta koji je ikada vidio da se može jedinstveno identificirati. Svaki od tih entiteta imat će dodijeljeni ID entiteta koji će biti rezerviran za samo ovaj entitet.

Koristite registar entiteta da biste nadjačali naziv, promijenili ID entiteta ili uklonili stavku iz 牧养犬. Napomena, uklanjanjem unosa registra entiteta neće se ukloniti entitet. Da biste to učinili, slijedite donju vezu i uklonite je s stranice integracije.
ui.panel.config.entity_registry.editor.e: Onemogućeni entiteti neće biti dodani u 牧养犬.
ui.panel.config.entity_registry.editor.c: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?
Deleting an entry will not remove the entity from 牧养犬. To do this, you will need to remove the integration '{platform}' from 牧养犬.
ui.panel.config.person.caption: Osobe
ui.panel.config.person.description: Upravljajte osobama koje 牧养犬 prati.
ui.panel.config.person.introduction: Here you can define each person of interest in 牧养犬.
ui.panel.config.person.note_about_person: Note: persons configured via configuration.yaml cannot be edited via the UI.
ui.panel.config.person.no_persons_create: Looks like you have not created any persons yet.
ui.panel.config.person.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this person?
ui.panel.config.person.confirm_delete2: All devices belonging to this person will become unassigned.
ui.panel.config.person.detail.name: Ime
ui.panel.config.person.detail.device_tra: Odaberite uređaje koji pripadaju ovoj osobi.

ui.panel.config.integrations.config_entr: Jeste li sigurni da želite izbrisati tu integraciju?

ui.panel.config.integrations.config_flow: Ovaj korak zahtijeva da posjetite vanjsku web stranicu.

ui.panel.config.zha.caption: ZHA
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.head: Zigbee Home Automation-Dodaj uređaje
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.disc: Pronađeni uređaji će se pojaviti ovdje. Slijedite upute za uređaj (e) i postavite uređaj (e) u način uparivanja.
ui.panel.config.zha.network_management.i: Commands that affect the entire network
ui.panel.config.zha.node_management.head: Device Management
ui.panel.config.zha.node_management.intr: Run ZHA commands that affect a single device. Pick a device to see a list of available commands.
ui.panel.config.zha.node_management.hint: Note: Sleepy (battery powered) devices need to be awake when executing commands against them. You can generally wake a sleepy device by triggering it.
Some devices such as Xiaomi sensors have a wake up button that you can press at ~5 second intervals that keep devices awake while you interact with them.
ui.panel.config.zha.node_management.help: Select a device to view per-device options.
ui.panel.config.zha.clusters.help_cluste: Select a cluster to view attributes and commands.
ui.panel.config.zha.cluster_attributes.h: Select an attribute to view or set its value.
Get the value for the selected attribute.
Set attribute value for the specified cluster on the specified entity.
ui.panel.config.zha.cluster_commands.hel: Select a command to interact with.
ui.panel.config.zha.services.reconfigure: Ponovno konfiguriaj ZHA uređaj (liječenje uređaja). Upotrijebite ovo ako imate problema s uređajem. Ako je uređaj u pitanju uređaj za bateriju, provjerite je li budan i prihvaća naredbe kada koristite ovu uslugu.
ui.panel.config.zha.services.updateDevic: Postavite prilagođeni naziv za ovaj uređaj u registru uređaja.
ui.panel.config.zwave.caption: Z-Wave
ui.panel.config.zwave.network_management: Pokrenite naredbe koje utječu na Z-Wave mrežu. Nećete dobiti povratne informacije o tome je li većina naredbi uspjela, ali možete provjeriti OZW dnevnik da biste to pokušali otkriti.
ui.panel.config.zwave.ozw_log.introducti: View the log. 0 is the minimum (loads entire log) and 1000 is the maximum. Load will show a static log and tail will auto update with the last specified number of lines of the log.
ui.panel.config.zwave.network_status.net: To može potrajati, ovisno o veličini vaše mreže.
Aktivni čvorovi su kontaktirani. Čvorovi koji spavaju će biti kontaktirani kada se probude.
